content.rendered:
Meaningful Ways to Help Ukraine

Donate supplies

A number of volunteer collection points have been set up in thousands of locations around the world to collect donations of goods for the Ukrainian army and refugees. From ammunition to clothing and pet food, many volunteer collection points and charities are currently accepting donations.

Moreover, donating supplies is considered the most transparent method of donating towards a humanitarian crisis, and the most efficient due to the lack of emergency items available for purchase in Ukraine.

Check the drop-off point in your country or city wherever you are in the world and donate supplies to Ukraine. Many local volunteer communities have organized all the collection, sorting and logistics in order to deliver donated items to the Ukrainian border and further to those in need.

Where to donate supplies near me

The reported needs include: 

  • Blankets, sleeping bags, bed linen, tents, 
  • Camp food, granola bars, snacks in packages, dried food, baby food, dry baby formula
  • Warm and thermal clothing, socks, raincoats
  • First aid kits, bandages, painkillers, baby medicine
  • Diapers, toiletries, toothbrushes and toothpaste
  • Torches with batteries, power banks, chargers
  • Helmets, bullet-proof vests, night-vision goggles, thermographic cameras

 

NOTE: Before donating supplies, make sure the items are still being collected, as some drop-offs have stopped accepting new donations while they process existing items. Also, check the current list of necessary items at the collection points, as it may change.

Now is your chance to make a difference.
Choose a donation point and drop off supplies for Ukraine. Thanks for your support!

Donate a Vehicle

Soldiers on the front lines and volunteer organizations that help civilians in the war zone need vehicles. If you own an SUV, ATV or pickup truck (in working condition) and are willing to donate – you will help provide food, medicine and other essentials to those in need. 

Donated vehicles are also turned into army transport and help soldiers fighting for freedom and democracy be more mobile. Any vehicles are very much in demand on the front line. If you have a spare car that you are willing to donate – it may be just what we need for our troops in the east.

Where to Donate My Vehicle
